name: savage-spin-out--physical
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.
